ENTRY.refkeywords: read image images img readimage readfile load IMAGECrate

DESC.PARA: The load_image command loads an image from a FITS file or an IMAGECrate and assigns it to a source id.

LIST.ITEM: id - the id of the dataset to use; if not given, uses the default dataset id (id=1 by default, see "ahelp get_default_id")
filename|PHACrate - the name of the file (with path) or PHACrate which contains the PHA data
coord - the coordinate system: logical, image, physical, world, or wcs; default=logical

DESC.PARA: Load an image from the file img.fits using the default id (1) and coordinate system (logical).
An image is read from the file psf.fits with world coordinate system and given data id "psf".
The image is read into an IMAGECrate (named "imgcr") from source.img. The image is then loaded into Sherpa from the crate, using the default options.

BUGS.PARA: See the bugs pages on the Sherpa website for an up-to-date listing of known bugs.
